name: Space Invaders (itch) (Ulysse)
description:
Hello there :)

Thank to be here :o

This is my second game ever. It's simply a remake of the famous Space Invaders, with some upgrades (bonus, moves, display, sprites...).

It was made without any editor (it was hard :o), just with the pyxel module by Kitao, if you want the code, it is in the downable content. At the beginning, it was just a NSI project for school, so thanks to my teacher and my class.

You can play it only on computer, but you can choose if you want to download the file, or just play the game on your browser.

And finally, I'm still a beginner, so if you find any bug or any upgrade's suggestion, please tell them to me in the comments :)

Thank a lot and have fun :o
